OOC: Ok.  Well, as long as everybody is okay with me taking my chars back, =
then my little "meanwhile..." story should be okay.

IC:  Hell Drak and Nec=
romancer entered the CF, after Quatro went in.  Necromancer wondered if Iro=
n Raptor was still the leader, and what changes had gone by.  It seemed lik=
e much time had passed, but if he knew how much time had really passed, he =
wouldn't be in so much wonder.  He decided to send a message to Iron Raptor=
 through his comm-link.

      "Iron Raptor, this is Necromancer, I've retu=
rned, and Hell Drak is with me," Necromancer said.
  ----- Original Message=
 ----- 
  From: CYBERWOLF4 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Friday, J=
une 15, 2001 12:20 PM
  Subject: Re: Remember Him..........



    The last=
 place I had Necromancer was in a large cave a few miles north of Maximal c=
ity. the last post I used him for was the battle between the Trainers and t=
he Maximals. If you'd like more details let me know.

    C.Wolf.

    ----=

    From: LurkerAbyss 
    To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups=
